NavHandler::ParamExpectation::ParamExpectation (  uint16  ID,
NParam::NParam_t  t,
uint16  minLength = 0,
uint16  maxLength = MAX_UINT16
)  [inline]
 

Constructor.

Parameters:
ID The parameter ID.
t The parameter type.
minLength Minimum length. Used only for parameters of type string or array. Defaults to 0.
maxLength Maximum length. Used only for parameters of type string or array. Defaults to MAX_UINT16.

Definition at line 125 of file NavHandler.h.

Member Function Documentation

bool NavHandler::ParamExpectation::checkParam (  const NParam *  param  )  const
 

Check a NParam object against this expectian.

Note that ID match is not checked by this function. Length check is performed, and special checks depending on expected type are performed.

Parameters:
param The NParam object to check.
Returns:
True if the NParam object met expectations, false otherwise.

uint16 NavHandler::ParamExpectation::maxLengthFromType (  NParam::NParam_t  t,
uint16  maxLength
)  [static, private]
 

Find correct max length from type and given length.

If the type is string or one of the array type, the returned value will be the same as the maxLength argument (unless it is invalid). Otherwise the length depends entirely on the type.

Parameters:
t The parameter data type.
minLength The given minimum length.

uint16 NavHandler::ParamExpectation::minLengthFromType (  NParam::NParam_t  t,
uint16  minLength
)  [static, private]
 

Find correct min length from type and given length.

If the type is string or one of the array type, the returned value will be the same as the minLength argument (unless it is invalid). Otherwise the length depends entirely on the type.

Parameters:
t The parameter data type.
minLength The given minimum length.
